DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-design , multiple-site clinical study evaluate therapeutic equivalence safety ivermectin cream 1 % ( Actavis Laboratories UT , Inc. ) SoolantraTM ( ivermectin ) cream 1 % ( Galderma ) treatment moderate severe papulopustular rosacea .
